definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יֶאֱנׁק]] Je 51:52; Inf. cstr. [[אֱנׁק]] Ez Eze 26:15, both of groaning of wounded ([[חָלָל]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: id., in mourning, lamentation; Inf. cstr. [[הֵאָנֵק]] Ez Eze 24:17 ‖[[עָשָׂה אֵבֶל]]); Pt. [[נֶאֱנׇקִים]] Eze 9:4 (‖[[נֶאֱנׇחִים]] sq. [[עַל]].
